snippet.title: Space Prison - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1865930/Space_Prison/?utm_source=releasetrailer

Survive the galaxy's toughest prison and rise to the top of a space gang! Explore, fight, craft, trade and learn convicts' stories to escape the facility. Space Prison is a turn-based tactical survival game with deep strategy and social RPG elements.

Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1865930/Space_Prison/
Official website - https://firesquid.games/games/space-prison
Newsletter - https://bit.ly/Newsletter_Space_Prison
Twitter - https://twitter.com/Wooden_Alien
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/firesquidgames/
Discord - https://discord.gg/vsxD6n8P8J

Trailer maker: Maverick Media
Voice actor: Amrit Sandhu
Music: Dishonored - Chris Phaze
Developed by Wooden Alien
Published by Firesquid
